FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: assignquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the id of the assignment that the AI used to generate the quizzes questions.

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz opens. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when this quiz closes. (0 = no restriction.)

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: The time limit for quiz attempts, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: overduehandling
FIELD.COMMENT: The method used to handle overdue attempts. 'autosubmit', 'graceperiod' or 'autoabandon'.

FIELD.NAME: graceperiod
FIELD.COMMENT: The amount of time (in seconds) after the time limit runs out during which attempts can still be submitted, if overduehandling is set to allow it.

FIELD.NAME: preferredbehaviour
FIELD.COMMENT: The behaviour to ask questions to use.

FIELD.NAME: canredoquestions
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows students to redo any completed question within a quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: attempts
FIELD.COMMENT: The maximum number of attempts a student is allowed.

FIELD.NAME: attemptonlast
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether subsequent attempts start from teh answer to the previous attempt (1) or start blank (0).

FIELD.NAME: grademethod
FIELD.COMMENT: One of the values QUIZ_GRADEHIGHEST, QUIZ_GRADEAVERAGE, QUIZ_ATTEMPTFIRST or QUIZ_ATTEMPTLAST.

FIELD.NAME: decimalpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of decimal points to use when displaying grades.

FIELD.NAME: questiondecimalpoints
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of decimal points to use when displaying question grades. (-1 means use decimalpoints.)

FIELD.NAME: reviewattempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. This is a bit field, decoded by the mod_quiz_display_options class. It is formed by ORing together the constants defined there.

FIELD.NAME: reviewcorrectness
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewmarks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewspecificfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewgeneralfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewrightanswer
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: reviewoverallfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether users are allowed to review their quiz attempts at various times. A bit field, like reviewattempt.

FIELD.NAME: questionsperpage
FIELD.COMMENT: How often to insert a page break when editing the quiz, or when shuffling the question order.

FIELD.NAME: navmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: Any constraints on how the user is allowed to navigate around the quiz. Currently recognised values are 'free' and 'seq'.

FIELD.NAME: shuffleanswers
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the parts of the question should be shuffled, in those question types that support it.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: The total of all the question instance maxmarks.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The total that the quiz overall grade is scaled to be out of.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: A password that the student must enter before starting or continuing a quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: subnet
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to restrict the IP addresses from which this quiz can be attempted. The format is as requried by the address_in_subnet function.

FIELD.NAME: browsersecurity
FIELD.COMMENT: Restriciton on the browser the student must use. E.g. 'securewindow'.

FIELD.NAME: delay1
FIELD.COMMENT: Delay that must be left between the first and second attempt, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: delay2
FIELD.COMMENT: Delay that must be left between the second and subsequent attempt, in seconds.

FIELD.NAME: showuserpicture
FIELD.COMMENT: Option to show the user's picture during the attempt and on the review page.

FIELD.NAME: showblocks
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether blocks should be shown on the attempt.php and review.php pages.

FIELD.NAME: allowofflineattempts
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether to allow the quiz to be attempted offline in the mobile app

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_slots
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the question used in a quiz, with the order, and for each question, which page it appears on, and the maximum mark (weight).

FIELD.NAME: slot
FIELD.COMMENT: Where this question comes in order in the list of questions in this quiz. Like question_attempts.slot.

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: page
FIELD.COMMENT: The page number that this questions appears on. If the question in slot n appears on page p, then the question in slot n+1 must appear on page p or p+1. Well, except that when a quiz is being created, there may be empty pages, which would cause the page number to jump here.

FIELD.NAME: requireprevious
FIELD.COMMENT: Set to 1 when current question requires previous one to be answered first.

FIELD.NAME: maxmark
FIELD.COMMENT: How many marks this question contributes to quiz.sumgrades.

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_sections
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores sections of a quiz with section name (heading), from slot-number N and whether the question order should be shuffled.

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: firstslot
FIELD.COMMENT: Number of the first slot in the section. The section runs from here to the start of the next section, or the end of the quiz.

FIELD.NAME: heading
FIELD.COMMENT: The text of the heading. May be an empty string/null. Multilang format.

FIELD.NAME: shufflequestions
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether the question order within this section should be shuffled for each attempt.

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_feedback
TABLE.COMMENT: Feedback given to students based on which grade band their overall score lies.

FIELD.NAME: quizid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: feedbacktext
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback to show for a attempt where mingrade <= attempt grade < maxgrade. See function quiz_feedback_for_grade in mod/quiz/locallib.php.

FIELD.NAME: mingrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The lower limit of this grade band. Inclusive.

FIELD.NAME: maxgrade
FIELD.COMMENT: The upper limit of this grade band. Exclusive.

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_overrides
TABLE.COMMENT: The overrides to quiz settings on a per-user and per-group basis.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references groups.id. Can be null if this is a per-user override.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id. Can be null if this is a per-group override.

FIELD.NAME: timeopen
FIELD.COMMENT: Time at which students may start attempting this quiz. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: timeclose
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Time limit in seconds. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: password
FIELD.COMMENT: Quiz password. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

FIELD.NAME: id
FIELD.COMMENT: Standard Moodle primary key.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the quiz that was attempted.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the user whose attempt this is.

FIELD.NAME: attempt
FIELD.COMMENT: Sequentially numbers this student's attempts at this quiz.

FIELD.NAME: uniqueid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key reference to the question_usage that holds the details of the the question_attempts that make up this quiz attempt.

FIELD.NAME: state
FIELD.COMMENT: The current state of the attempts. 'inprogress', 'overdue', 'finished' or 'abandoned'.

FIELD.NAME: timestart
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was started.

FIELD.NAME: timefinish
FIELD.COMMENT: Time when the attempt was submitted. 0 if the attempt has not been submitted yet.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time.

FIELD.NAME: timemodifiedoffline
FIELD.COMMENT: Last modified time via web services.

FIELD.NAME: timecheckstate
FIELD.COMMENT: Next time quiz cron should check attempt for state changes. NULL means never check.

FIELD.NAME: sumgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Total marks for this attempt.

FIELD.NAME: gradednotificationsenttime
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp when the 'graded' notification was sent.

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the overall grade for each user on the quiz, based on their various attempts and the quiz.grademethod setting.

FIELD.NAME: quiz
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references quiz.id.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The overall grade from the quiz. Not affected by overrides in the gradebook.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this grade changed.

TABLE.NAME: aiquiz_reports
TABLE.COMMENT: Lists all the installed quiz reports and their display order and so on. No need to worry about deleting old records. Only records with an equivalent directory are displayed.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: name of the report, same as the directory name

FIELD.NAME: displayorder
FIELD.COMMENT: display order for report tabs

FIELD.NAME: capability
FIELD.COMMENT: Capability required to see this report. May be blank which means use the default of mod/quiz:viewreport. This is used when deciding which tabs to render.

TABLE.NAME: aiassign
TABLE.COMMENT: This table saves information about an instance of mod_assign in a course.

FIELD.NAME: assignquizid
FIELD.COMMENT: This is the id of the assignment that the AI used to generate the quizzes questions.

FIELD.NAME: alwaysshowdescription
FIELD.COMMENT: If false the assignment intro will only be displayed after the allowsubmissionsfrom date. If true it will always be displayed.

FIELD.NAME: nosubmissions
FIELD.COMMENT: This field is a cache for is_any_submission_plugin_enabled() which allows Moodle pages to distinguish offline assignment types without loading the assignment class.

FIELD.NAME: submissiondrafts
FIELD.COMMENT: If true, assignment submissions will be considered drafts until the student clicks on the submit assignmnet button.

FIELD.NAME: sendnotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows the disabling of email notifications in the assign module.

FIELD.NAME: sendlatenotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Allows separate enabling of notifications for late assignment submissions.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The due date for the assignment. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: requiresubmissionstatement
FIELD.COMMENT: Forces the student to accept a submission statement when submitting an assignment

FIELD.NAME: completionsubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If this field is set to 1, then the activity will be automatically marked as 'complete' once the user submits their assignment.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this assignment without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: teamsubmission
FIELD.COMMENT: Do students submit in teams?

FIELD.NAME: requireallteammemberssubmit
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, a submission will not be accepted until all team members have submitted it.

FIELD.NAME: teamsubmissiongroupingid
FIELD.COMMENT: A grouping id to get groups for team submissions

FIELD.NAME: blindmarking
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide student/grader identities until the reveal identities action is performed

FIELD.NAME: hidegrader
FIELD.COMMENT: Hide the grader's identity from students. The opposite of blind marking.

FIELD.NAME: revealidentities
FIELD.COMMENT: Show identities for a blind marking assignment

FIELD.NAME: attemptreopenmethod
FIELD.COMMENT: How to determine when students are allowed to open a new submission. Valid options are none, manual, untilpass

FIELD.NAME: maxattempts
FIELD.COMMENT: What is the maximum number of student attempts allowed for this assignment? -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: markingworkflow
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, marking workflow features will be used in this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: markingallocation
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled, marking allocation features will be used in this assignment

FIELD.NAME: sendstudentnotifications
FIELD.COMMENT: Default for send student notifications checkbox when grading.

FIELD.NAME: preventsubmissionnotingroup
FIELD.COMMENT: If enabled a user will be unable to make a submission unless they are a member of a group.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment instance.

INDEX.NAME: teamsubmissiongroupingid
INDEX.COMMENT: The grouping id for team submissions

TABLE.NAME: aiassign_submission
TABLE.COMMENT: This table keeps information about student interactions with the mod/assign. This is limited to metadata about a student submission but does not include the submission itself which is stored by plugins.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time of the first student submission to this assignment.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this assignment submission was modified by a student.

FIELD.NAME: timestarted
FIELD.COMMENT: The time when the student stared the submission.

FIELD.NAME: status
FIELD.COMMENT: The status of this assignment submission. The current statuses are DRAFT and SUBMITTED.

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: The group id for team submissions

FIELD.NAME: attemptnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to track attempts for an assignment

FIELD.NAME: latest
FIELD.COMMENT: Greatly simplifies queries wanting to know information about only the latest attempt.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this assignment submission.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The instance of mod_assign this submission belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: latestattempt
INDEX.COMMENT: Speed up queries for the latest attempt.

TABLE.NAME: aiassign_grades
TABLE.COMMENT: Grading information about a single assignment submission.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: The time the assignment submission was first modified by a grader.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The most recent modification time for the assignment submission by a grader.

FIELD.NAME: grade
FIELD.COMMENT: The numerical grade for this assignment submission. Can be determined by scales/advancedgradingforms etc but will always be converted back to a floating point number.

FIELD.NAME: attemptnumber
FIELD.COMMENT: The attempt number that this grade relates to

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this grade.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this grade belongs to.

INDEX.NAME: userid
INDEX.COMMENT: The userid for the submission relating to this grade.

INDEX.NAME: uniqueattemptgrade
INDEX.COMMENT: This is a grade for a unique attempt.

TABLE.NAME: aiassign_plugin_config
TABLE.COMMENT: Config data for an instance of a plugin in an assignment.

FIELD.NAME: value
FIELD.COMMENT: The value of the config setting. Stored as text but can be interpreted by the plugin however it likes.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique id to identify this plugin setting value.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this config value relates to.

INDEX.NAME: subtype
INDEX.COMMENT: The subtype of this plugin (assign_submission or assign_feedback).

INDEX.NAME: name
INDEX.COMMENT: The name of this plugin setting.

TABLE.NAME: aiassign_user_mapping
TABLE.COMMENT: Map an assignment specific id number to a user

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique ID for this user/assignment combination.

KEY.NAME: user
KEY.COMMENT: The user to map to an id

TABLE.NAME: aiassign_user_flags
TABLE.COMMENT: List of flags that can be set for a single user in a single assignment.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: The id of the user these flags apply to.

FIELD.NAME: assignment
FIELD.COMMENT: The assignment these flags apply to.

FIELD.NAME: locked
FIELD.COMMENT: Student cannot make any changes to their submission if this flag is set.

FIELD.NAME: mailed
FIELD.COMMENT: Has the student been sent a notification about this grade update?

FIELD.NAME: extensionduedate
FIELD.COMMENT: An extension date assigned to an individual student.

FIELD.NAME: workflowstate
FIELD.COMMENT: The current workflow state of the grade

FIELD.NAME: allocatedmarker
FIELD.COMMENT: The allocated marker to this submission

KEY.NAME: userid
KEY.COMMENT: The id field of the user table.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment id these flags apply to.

INDEX.NAME: mailed
INDEX.COMMENT: Has this user been mailed yet?

FIELD.NAME: assignid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references assign.id

FIELD.NAME: groupid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references groups.id. Can be null if this is a per-user override.

FIELD.NAME: userid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key references user.id. Can be null if this is a per-group override.

FIELD.NAME: sortorder
FIELD.COMMENT: Rank for sorting overrides.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time at which students may start attempting this assign. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: Time by which students must have completed their attempt. Can be null, in which case the assign default is used.

FIELD.NAME: timelimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Time limit in seconds. Can be null, in which case the quiz default is used.

TABLE.NAME: aiassignfeedback_file
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores info about the number of files submitted by a student.

FIELD.NAME: numfiles
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of files uploaded by a grader.

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: Unique id for this feedback value.

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this feedback relates to.

KEY.NAME: grade
KEY.COMMENT: The grade instance this feedback relates to.

FIELD.NAME: commenttext
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback text

FIELD.NAME: commentformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The feedback text format

KEY.NAME: primary
KEY.COMMENT: The unique id for this feedback

KEY.NAME: assignment
KEY.COMMENT: The assignment instance this feedback relates to.

KEY.NAME: grade
KEY.COMMENT: The grade instance this feedback relates to.

TABLE.NAME: assignquiz
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the aiquiz activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module instance

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: Activity description.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the intro field.
